thread.title: Joe O'Brien
thread.title_full: 53 Degrees North reviewed by Joe O'Brien

author: Joe O'Brien
title: Joe O'Brien
text:
I enquired about an article that was not on the Website. The person who answered my phone call had a check of the stock on the floor. He made arrangements to allow me to purchase and pay for the item on line.
Excellent and efficient service.
Will continue to recommend 53Â°North as THE place to go for outdoor equipment etc.
